{"metadata":{"objective":"Add support","lastStepAudioPath":""},"steps":[{"headerText":"Everything went wrong . . .","leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>You are</strong></span> writing a one-paragraph complaint letter to the Gravel Mountain Motel in an effort to get your money back after a terrible stay.&nbsp; You know your audience and purpose and have a strong topic sentence.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>Your next step</strong> </span>is to add details and support that will convince the manager to give you a refund.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>Try it!</strong></span><br /><br /><span style=\"line-height: 20.8px;\">Note:&nbsp; Facts can be checked and proven to be accurate.<br /><br />Which sentence states a fact that supports the topic sentence?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_2ef3bc80-1ced-90df-77c4-29ef26c92fb5\" style=\"width: 200px; When support is not specific, it not as convincing.</li><li>Think about your <strong>audience</strong>, and include details that will be important to readers.<br />&nbsp;</li></ol>","rightText":null,"headerText":""},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_177ab784-2648-915c-55eb-a9884a786174\" style=\"width: 200px; The walls were so thin that we could hear the people next door to us snoring loudly all night long.&nbsp; Nobody in my family got a moment of sleep for the entire night.&nbsp; The TV in our room was not working correctly, leaving us with nothing to do in the torrential rainstorm. &nbsp;When we called to complain, no one was available to speak with us.&nbsp; When we did speak with someone, he was rude and unhelpful.&nbsp; He told us, &quot;Why don&#39;t you fix the TV yourselves?&quot;&nbsp; The night I spent at the Gravel Mountain Motel was the most unpleasant vacation experience I have ever had.&nbsp; When we did speak with someone, he was rude and unhelpful.&nbsp; He told us, &quot;Why don&#39;t you fix the TV yourselves?&quot;&nbsp; The night I spent at the Gravel Mountain Motel was the most unpleasant vacation experience I have ever had.&nbsp;
